executable.title: ExtractLabelSurfaces
executable.description: ExtractLabelSurfaces is a tool which extracted labels surfaces from a surface containing labels
executable.contributor: Danaele Puechmaille, Francois Budin, Juan Carlos Prieto, Martin Styner, Adrien Boucaud
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grants U01 MH070890 - U54 HD079124 - R01 MH091351.

boolean.name: createSurfaceLabelFiles
boolean.label: Create Surface Label Files
boolean.description: Create surfaces corresponding to each label : required flags --labelNumberInfo and --vtkFile. You can specified a prefix for identify surfaces files (for exemple : lh or rh).

boolean.name: extractPointData
boolean.label: Extract Point Data
boolean.description: Extract Point Data from the vtk file containing labels : required flags --vtklabelFile --arrayName/-a and --labelNameInfo

boolean.name: useTranslationTable
boolean.label: useTranslationTable
boolean.description: Find label filename with a translation table

boolean.name: translateToLabelNumber
boolean.label: Translate To Label Number
boolean.description: Translate labelNameInformation file to labelNumberInformation file : required flags --labelNameInfo and --labelNumberInfo. If you add a Translation table then you need to specified flags --useTable and --labelTranslationTable

geometry.name: vtkFile
geometry.label: VTK File
geometry.description: Surface without label information from which we extract the different labeled surfaces ( myfile.vtk )

string.name: ignoreLabel
string.label: ignoreLabel
string.description: Ignore the label Name specify - this label won't be created (ex : -i "0 0 0"). MUST BE USE WITH OPTION --useTranslationTable AND --labelTranslationTable

string.name: prefix
string.label: prefix
string.description: Prefix added in names of each output files

file.name: labelTranslationTable
file.label: Translation Table for labelNumber
file.description: Table containing label number for each label name

file.name: labelNameInfo
file.label: List of label information
file.description: List containing label information by name. If 'extractPointData' is used, this file is generated.

file.name: labelNumberInfo
file.label: Load label info list by number
file.description: List containing label information by number in accordance with a Translation table (--useTranslationTable) or not.

directory.name: outputSurfaceDirectory
directory.label: Ouput directory when '--createSurfaceLabelFiles' is used
directory.description: Directory used to create the surfaces
